const response = await client.ml.putDataFrameAnalytics({
  id: "loan_classification",
  source: {
    index: "loan-applicants",
  },
  dest: {
    index: "loan-applicants-classified",
  },
  analysis: {
    classification: {
      dependent_variable: "label",
      training_percent: 75,
      num_top_classes: 2,
    },
  },
});
console.log(response);
